body.name: USB Wall Charger, 3 Pack 3-Port USB Charger Block Wall Adapter USB Charging Cube Brick Compatible with iPhone 8/7/6 Plus/X, iPad, Samsung Galaxy S5 S6 S7 Edge, LG, Android and More
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 12 hrs 26 mins
features: 【3-USB Charging Ports】USB wall charger block is designed with 3 USB ports in one cube, allowing you to charge multiple devices simultaneously. Whether you need to charge your smartphone, tablet, smartwatch, or other USB-powered devices, eliminating the need for multiple chargers.

【Universal Compatibility】This is a 3-port USB charging cube that works universally for nearly all devices. The usb wall plug is compatible with iPhone 14/13/12/11 Pro Max, Mini, SE, XR, XS MAX, XS, X, 8 Plus, iPad Pro, iPad Air, iPad mini, Samsung Galaxy and more USB-ported devices.

【Fast Efficient Charging】USB charger block delivers an even output: 2.1A 5V, which ensure a fast and efficient charging to your devices. Not only saves your charging time, but always ensuring that you have a fully charged device.

【Pack of 3 & Portable】You are getting 3pcs USB power adapters, so you can bring one in office, one at home and one for travel. It’s lightweight and compact, which can be easily carried in a bag or pocket, allowing you to take it with you wherever you go.

【Reliable Quality & Safety】The wall chargers with ports are well built for long lasting service. Protecting your devices from overcharging, overheating, and short circuits. Let you rest assured that your devices being charged safely. Any issues during charging, please don’t hesitate to contact us for satisfactory solution.
body.description: The 3 pack USB Wall Charger are a convenient and versatile charging solution for all your electronic devices. With this pack, you get 3 separate USB wall plugs, each equipped with 3 USB ports, enabling you to charge multiple devices simultaneously. Convenient when we both want to charge our phone at night in the same outlet, whether at home or traveling. Features: 1. 3 pack USB Wall Charger block with 3 USB ports offers a convenient and efficient charging solution for multiple devices 2. Built-in intelligence chips protects your devices from overcharging, overheating, and short circuits, ensures complete safety 3. It is lightweight and compact, so you can easily toss it in your handbag, pocket without taking much space 4. Widely compatible with iPhone 14/13/12/11 Pro Max, Mini, SE, XR, XS MAX, XS, X, 8 Plus, iPad Pro, iPad Air, iPad mini, Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra Note10 Plus 9, and more 5. The charger will automatically stop charging when power is full, which can maximum protect your device. Specification: Item: 3-Port USB charging block Material: ABS Size: 1.3x1.3x2.1Inch Voltage: 5V/2.1A Package includes: 3 x 3-port USB Cube Power Adapter

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a wonderful charger. Easy to use and works perfectly. I like it so much this is the second set I ordered. (Shared the others with my kids)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price for fast chargers, and 3 of them!
reviews.reviewText: We placed one of these in each of our bedrooms and so far they charge quickly with 1 device connected. Have not tried using every USB port at once though. So far, it charges our Ipads at about 80% as fast as the OEM Apple power supply, and our Android phones charges just as fast as the OEM power supplies. For the dirt cheap price, these are well worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid connection between cord and outlet bop
reviews.reviewText: Great cord lenght. For my phone and I pad

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars What I was looking for!
reviews.reviewText: My only complaint is only 1 charger worked. I only needed 1 so the broke one was going to be a back up. I didn't reach out. I'm sure they would have replaced it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast charging and long chord are so convenient
reviews.reviewText: I just returned from a one week vacation feeling frustrated by my slow charging (5 watt) charger. Hard to keep my devices charged with the extra use during travel. With 2 chargers for such a good price, I’ll keep one in my suitcase so I never forget it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Be Aware of the Longevity of this product.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I was so EXCITED when I first got these cords. Speed to charge is excellent, and it is long enough to reach my bed from the outlet. All the things I needed to be able to get a long lasting charge. Flash forward to about 2 weeks ago, after owning the product ONLY 6 MONTHS, one of my cords no longer works. I did all the tests. Then a blocks stops working. I am not sure if there is a kill switch in their or not, but for someone who typically has cords that lasts well OVER 5 YEARS due to how well I take care of my electronics, I’m shocked that both a block and 1 cord no longer fulfill the desired purpose.These are great for charging, and have excellent speed, but don’t expect to get 1-2 years out of them, especially with children or rough environments.Into the trash it goes.
